> <OLD>
>
> "Agree, Lets do it"hissed the male

The trip to the location of the others was relatively short.

HELLSCREAM, MAX-B, DIRGEGUN and THRUSTOR were all at what appeared to
be an old manufacturing plant.

The area around the plant was an old city. The city was burnt out, old
and rusted. Buildings had fallen over due to disuse and the power of
the storms and weather that had been across it over the years. Plants
and brush had grown up all around the city and even animals were seen
hiding amidst the old buildings and structures.

Only the plant itself seemed to be in any kind of shape, presumably
because the seekers had been already working on it.

HELLSCREAM was standing at the top giving orders while DIRGEGUN and
THRUSTOR were picking up large pieces of metal and trying to
strengthen their base. It would take some work to get it in shape, but
it looked like it was possible given time.

(TAG)

- Preston
